#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long unsigned int maxm=1,streak=1;
    char c,prev,max_char;
    c=getchar();
    prev=c;
    max_char=c;
    while(1)
    {
        c=getchar();
        if(c=='\n')
            break;
        if(c==prev)
            streak++;
        else
            streak=1;
        if(maxm<streak)
        {
            maxm=streak;
            max_char=c;
        }
        else if(maxm==streak)
        {
            if(max_char>c)
                max_char=c;
        }
        prev=c;
    }
    cout<<max_char<<endl<<maxm;
}
